preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_constraints c JOIN user_cons_columns cc ON cc.constraint_name = c.constraint_name JOIN user_constraints rc ON rc.constraint_name = c.r_constraint_name JOIN user_cons_columns rcc ON rcc.constraint_name = rc.constraint_name WHERE c.table_name = 'VAI_DOCAI_DOCUMENT_EXTRACTS' AND cc.column_name = 'DOCUMENT_ID' AND c.constraint_type = 'R' AND rc.table_name = 'VAI_DOCAI_DOCUMENTS' AND rcc.column_name = 'DOCUMENT_ID';

n0:createOracleRefConstraint.n0:source: ALTER TABLE "VAI_DOCAI_DOCUMENT_EXTRACTS" ADD CONSTRAINT "VAI_DOCAI_DOCUMENT_EXTRACTS_FK01" FOREIGN KEY ("DOCUMENT_ID") REFERENCES "VAI_DOCAI_DOCUMENTS" ("DOCUMENT_ID") ENABLE
